PHRASE.LANG: Hold on tight to this American football and you'll have the right to be self-proclaimed permanent quarterback. [#Legal]
Accrochez-vous bien à ce ballon de foot américain et vous serez peut-être quaterback de l'année. [#Legal]
Wer hier immer schön am Ball bleibt, darf sich selbst zum Quarterback der Saison ernennen! [#Legal]
Questa palla da football americano è da prendere al volo, così da avere il diritto di autoproclamarsi quarterback titolare. [#Legal]
Sujetad bien este balón de fútbol americano y tendréis derecho a proclamaros quarterbacks. [#Legal]
이 공을 꼭 잡고 있으면 자칭 쿼터백이 될 자격이 있습니다. [#Legal]
Hold on tight to this American football and you'll have the right to be self-proclaimed permanent quarterback. [#Legal]
抓緊這個美式足球，你便有權自稱為永遠的四分衛。 [#Legal]
抓緊這個美式足球，你便有權自稱為永遠的四分衛。 [#Legal]
Hold on tight to this football and you'll have the right to be self-proclaimed permanent quarterback. [#Legal]
